metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11637 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GNU recutils 1.8. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function rec_rset_get_props at rec-rset.c in librec.a, leading to a crash.

criterions.comment: recutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
